title: Ham Salad for Two
directions: Toss ham, celery, sweet onion, red bell pepper, sweet pickle, pineapple, creamy salad dressing, honey mustard, dill weed, black pepper, curry powder, and garlic powder together in a large bowl.
Refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1/2 (12 ounce) package fully-cooked ham steak, cut into strips
1/2 cup chopped sweet onion (such as Vidalia)
1/4 cup chopped sweet pickle, or more to taste
1 (8 ounce) can diced pineapple, fully drained
1 pinch curry powder, or to taste (optional)
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste (optional)
